document_data.name: High Hall of Swords
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Hall of Swords''' was the local temple of [[Tempus]] in the city of [[Mulmaster]], as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the eastern region of the city, near the [[Southroad Keep]].
document_data.Services: Throughout the 1350s and '60s, the High Hall of Swords was overseen by High Priest-Captain [[Ghallas Kheinstar|Ghallas "Foesmiter" Kheinstar]] and tended by 16 war-priests.
